MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 postcode area of Longniddry, affecting properties in Coates Farm and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:32pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead lone located at South Lodge and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:24pm on Friday, 16 October 2020
